title: craft twig array test
description: Returns whether an object is an array via PHP’s is_array()

title: craft twig boolean test
description: Returns whether an object is a boolean via PHP’s is_bool()

title: craft twig callable test
description: Returns whether an object is callable via PHP’s is_callable()

title: craft twig countable test
description: Returns whether an object is countable via PHP’s is_countable()

title: craft twig float test
description: Returns whether an object is a float via PHP’s is_float()

title: craft twig instance of test
description: Returns whether an object is an instance of another object or class.

title: craft twig integer test
description: Returns whether an object is an integer via PHP’s is_int()

title: craft twig missing test
description: Returns whether an object is missing.

title: craft twig numeric test
description: Returns whether an object is numeric via PHP’s is_numeric()

title: craft twig object test
description: Returns whether an object is an object via PHP’s is_object()

title: craft twig resource test
description: Returns whether an object is a resource via PHP’s is_resource()

title: craft twig scalar test
description: Returns whether an object is a scalar via PHP’s is_scalar()

title: craft twig string test
description: Returns whether an object is a string via PHP’s is_string()
